definition: Montenegro, former Yugoslavia/Heishan county in Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, Liaoning
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
black/dark/sinister/secret/shady/illegal/to hide (sth) away/to vilify/(loanword) to hack (computing)
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Heishan county in Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, Liaoning
Serbia and Montenegro (after break-up of Yugoslavia in 1992)
pinyin: Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4 he2 Hei1 shan1

sentences.english: Montenegro is one of the non-EU states which uses the euro.
sentences.chinese: 黑山共和国是一个非欧盟成员国使用欧元的国家。

sentences.english: Both Liujiaxia and Heishanxia reservoirs can meet the requirements of ice prevention.
sentences.chinese: 刘家峡水库或黑山峡水库均能满足防凌要求。

sentences.english: Black Goat received White Goat's letter.
sentences.chinese: 黑山羊收到白山羊的信。

sentences.english: The research paper is based on Heishan county that is located in Jinzhou, Liaoning Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文以辽宁省锦州市黑山县为主要背景。

sentences.english: Heishan county is the cradle of Errenzhuan, which has more than two hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 黑山县是二人转的发祥地，有着二百多年的历史。

sentences.english: I would also like to take this opportunity to congratulate the Republic of Montenegro on becoming a member of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 借此机会，我对黑山共和国加入联合国表示祝贺。

sentences.english: We crossed the first Wyoming between the Black Hills and the Big Horns.
sentences.chinese: 在黑山和大霍恩山脉之间，我们穿越了第一个怀俄明。

sentences.english: Serbia and Montenegro has an estimated population of 10.8 million.
sentences.chinese: 据估计塞尔维亚和黑山有人口1千80万。

sentences.english: The olivine from the Laoheishan is chrysolite.
sentences.chinese: 老黑山熔岩中的橄榄石是贵橄榄石。

sentences.english: White Goat received Black Goat's letter.
sentences.chinese: 白山羊收到黑山羊的信。

sentences.english: The 27-year-old Montenegrin blames the pop world for his instrument's demise.
sentences.chinese: 这位27岁的黑山人将吉他的消亡归咎于流行乐界。

sentences.english: The ram was present as a mascot and was not sacrificed. (AP Photo/Vadim Ghirda)
sentences.chinese: 这只黑山羊是吉祥物，并不会被作为牺牲。

sentences.english: Direct liquefaction properties of coal samples from Heishan, Xinjiang, were studied at lower pressure.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了新疆黑山煤低压下直接液化性能。

sentences.english: I invite the leaders in Belgrade and Podgorica to consolidate this trend," De Gucht said.
sentences.chinese: 我吁请塞尔维亚和黑山领导人推进这一民主趋势。

sentences.english: The Saric affair has hit the reputation of Montenegro at a bad moment for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 萨里奇事件在经济形势不佳的此时打击了黑山的名声。

definition: Yin mountains in Inner Mongolia
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
crow/black
national border/frontier
North of Xinjiang
Tieshan district of Huangshi city 黃石市|黄石市[Huang2 shi2 shi4], Hubei
Heishui county (Tibetan: khro chu rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
city
ruins of Heishui Town of Xixia 西夏[Xi1 Xia4] people, in Ejin Banner 額濟納旗|额济纳旗[E2 ji4 na4 Qi2], Alxa League 阿拉善盟[A1 la1 shan4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names
Yellow Sea (Korean term)
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
allied armies
narrow mountain pass/defile
field/plain/CL:個|个[ge4]
